meanings: (정보나 지식을 갖추다) know, learn, have (good) knowledge (of), be familiar (with)
(이해하다) understand, know, see, follow, appreciate, (informal) get, make out
(깨닫다, 인지하다) realize, recognize, find, notice, sense, (formal) perceive, be aware (of), be conscious (of)

vlive.korean: 알고... I know it. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 시차적응중😅
우리 스테이는 알고 계시려나? Do STAY know about this play? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
vlive.english: Do STAY know about this play?

vlive.korean: 그거 진짜 재밌는 건 줄 알고... I thought it was really fun movie. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
vlive.english: I thought it was really fun movie.

vlive.korean: 오늘 의상 콘셉트가 보라해 보라색인 거 다들 알고 계셨나요? Did you notice that our outfits are purple? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: Did you notice that our outfits are purple?

vlive.korean: 수윤이 현생에 알고 있는 누군가와 비슷하거나 닮았나요? Does she look like someone in your current life? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임
vlive.english: Does she look like someone in your current life?

examples.korean: She knew that she had to confront her fears. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자신의 공포감에 맞서야 한다는 것을 알고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
